    KiKit

    Open SourceGithub CI

    Mainly for panelization, can also export

    kikit panelize 
  --layout 'grid; rows: 2; cols: 3;'
  --tabs 'full'
  --cuts 'vcuts'
  --source 'tolerance: 10mm'
  --post 'millradius: 0.5mm;'
  input.kicad_pcb output.kicad_pcb
